slide.title: Comprehensive Solutions Since 2004
slide.subtitle: The types of equipment and products we distribute have grown; our commitment to quality, excellence, and customer service are stronger than ever.

slide.title: Fire & Rescue
slide.subtitle: High-quality equipment, supplies, training, and 24/7 support with knowledgeable staff who, in some instances, have been in the fire industry for years themselves.

slide.title: Law Enforcement
slide.subtitle: Police officers, now more than ever, need handheld illicit drug identification technology, PPE, and gear that is reliable and affordable.

slide.title: Security Screening
slide.subtitle: Keep contraband under control by using the highest-quality and reliable x-ray machines and screening solutions on the market.

slide.title: Military
slide.subtitle: Proper countermeasure equipment and training can ensure an effective response to chemical warfare agents (CWA) and weapons of mass destruction (WMD) and is an essential part of preparedness.

slide.title: Oil & Gas
slide.subtitle: Keep your operation running smoothly by utilizing a wide variety of gas detection, safety products, and hi-vis clothing needed whether you drill, pump or transport.

slide.title: Environmental Quality
slide.subtitle: Buying new or renting, find the highest quality and latest environmental instrumentation and field supplies for your upcoming project.
